CREATEDB: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS newdb
CREATEUSERTABLE: CREATE TABLE newdb.Users ( id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, firstName VARCHAR(45) NULL, lastName VARCHAR(45) NULL, Address VARCHAR(45) NULL, Email VARCHAR(45) NULL, dateOfBirth VARCHAR(45) NULL, Password VARCHAR(45) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATECARTTABLE: CREATE TABLE newdb.Cart ( id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, userId INT NOT NULL, itemId INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id));
WISHLIST: CREATE TABLE newdb.wishlist ( id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, userId INT NULL, itemId INT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id));
